name: Caedendi's Extended Loot Filter
description: A fully customizable loot filter with lots of presets to remove clutter and highlight the good stuff.
author: Caedendi

config.name: Gold
config.description: Customize the "Gold" affix for gold drops. [CSTM-GLD]

config.name: Runes
config.description: Customize Runes. Remove the "Rune" affix, add rune numbers and highlight the better Runes (Ral, Hel, Io and up). [CSTM-RUN]

options.label: Add Rune numbers, add highlights, remove affix

config.name: Healing Potions
config.description: Customize Healing, Mana and Rejuvenation Potions. [CSTM-HPT]

options.label: Hide lvl 1-3 Healing/Mana & Small Rejuvenation Potions
Hide lvl 1-4 Healing/Mana & Small Rejuvenation Potions

config.name: Buff Potions
config.description: Customize Antidote, Thawing and Stamina Potions. [CSTM-BPT]

config.name: Throwing Potions
config.description: Customize Strangling/Choking/Rancid Gas and Fulminating/Exploding/Oil Potions. [CSTM-TPT]

config.name: Scrolls & Tomes
config.description: Customize ID/TP Scrolls and Tomes. [CSTM-SCR]

config.name: Arrows & Bolts
config.description: Customize Arrows & Bolts. [CSTM-ARB]

config.name: Keys
config.description: Customize regular keys for opening locked chests. For Uber keys, see Endgame. [CSTM-KEY]

config.name: Gems
config.description: Customize Gems. [CSTM-GEM1] and [CSTM-GEM2]

options.label: Highlight, show only Flawless and Perfect Gems

config.name: Jewels
config.description: Customize Jewels. Currently identified Facets only; I have not yet found a good way to customize unidentified/Magic/Rare Jewels. [CSTM-JWL]

config.name: Charms
config.description: Customize Magic, Unique and Sunder Charms. Highlight (un)identified Charms by coloring "Charm" red. The Small/Large/Grand part stays in its original color to distinguish rarity.

config.name: Quest Items
config.description: Highlight Quest Items. Exclude the Horadric Cube to fix messing up the Cube window's title and some NPC dialog where it is mentioned. [CSTM-QST1] and [CSTM-QST2]

config.name: Endgame Items
config.description: Highlight Essences, Tokens, Keys, Organs and optionally the Standard of Heroes. For Annihilus and Hellfire Torch, see Charms. [CSTM-END]

config.name: Item Level
config.description: Show the iLvl on weapons, armor, rings, amulets, charms and jewels as a suffix.

config.name: Short Superior/Inferior Prefixes
config.description: Shorten the Superior/Damaged/Cracked/Crude/Low Quality modifiers on weapons and armor to + (plus) and - (minus/dash). Optionally color Inferior items gray. Works the same as mod Short Quality Prefixes by Jobus. [CSTM-SPIF]

config.name: Item Quality
config.description: Show the item quality (normal/exceptional/elite) on weapons and armor as either a prefix or a suffix. Recommended to use suffix to match the Item Level suffix if enabled. [CSTM-QLTY]

config.name: Runes
config.description: Shine a Light Pillar on Runes on the ground.

config.name: Circlets
config.description: Shine a Light Pillar on Circlets, Coronets, Tiaras and Diadems on the ground.

config.name: Rings & Amulets
config.description: Shine a Light Pillar on Rings and Amulets on the ground.

config.name: Gems & Jewels
config.description: Shine a Light Pillar on Gems and Jewels on the ground. Since these item types share the same graphics, they can not be set separately.

config.name: Charms
config.description: Shine a Light Pillar on Charms on the ground. Annihilus shares its graphics with Mephisto's Soulstone, so enabling either Charms or Quest Items results in Light Pillars for both. Unfortunately Hellfire Torch is not supported because some monsters carry Torches. I can't enable Light Pillars for Torches without turning certain monster groups into a dance party.

config.name: Quest Items
config.description: Shine a Light Pillar on Quest Items on the ground. Khalim's Eye and Brain share graphics with Baal's Eye and Mephisto's Brain, so enabling either Quest Items or Organs results in Light Pillars for all four of them.

config.name: Essences
config.description: Shine a Light Pillar on Essences on the ground.

config.name: Token of Absolution
config.description: Shine a Light Pillar on Tokens of Absolution on the ground.

config.name: Keys
config.description: Shine a Light Pillar on Keys of Terror/Hate/Destruction on the ground.

config.name: Organs
config.description: Shine a Light Pillar on Uber Organs on the ground. Baal's Eye and Mephisto's Brainshare graphics with Khalim's Eye and Brain, so enabling either Quest Items or Organs results in Light Pillars for all four of them.

config.name: Alternate Color Schemes
config.description:
Use alternate color schemes for certain item types.

Facets: rainbow-colored highlights.

Sunder Charms: highlight colors match their elements.

Runes: change name color from the default orange to purple for Lem and higher runes. Highlights remain red and the name will not color (partly) red for these runes.

config.name: Highlight character
config.description: Character used to highlight select items. [CSTM-HLC]

config.name: Tooltip width for hidden items
config.description: Set how many spaces wide the tooltip for hidden items is (0-25).

config.name: Tooltip mods
config.description: Modifies the size and background opacity of the tooltip for items on the ground and in the inventory.

config.name: Tooltip: opacity
config.description: Set the tooltip background opacity (unmodded = 0.6).

config.name: Tooltip: font size
config.description: Set the tooltip font size (unmodded = 36).
